content: 22 chain 1 * single_crochet in chain-5 space 9 double_crochet in next chain-5 space repeat from * around slip st to first single_crochet and to unused bl of first single_crochet of round 20 24 single_crochet and 24 groups of 9 double_crochet round 23 chain 1 working in unused bl only of single_crochet from round 20 * single_crochet in each of 7 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around slip st to first single_crochet 54 single_crochet round 24 chain 1 * single_crochet in each of 8 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around slip st to first single_crochet 60 single_crochet round 25 * chain 7 skip single_crochet slip st in next single_crochet repeat from * around slip st to first slip st and into chain-7 space 30 slip stitches and 30 chain-7 spaces round 26 chain 1 * single_crochet in chain-7 space 2 single_crochet 2 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 single_crochet in next chain- 7 space around repeat from * around slip st to first single_crochet and into first skipped single_crochet from round 23 15 single_crochet and 15 groups round 27 * chain 7 slip st in next skipped single_crochet from round 24 repeat from * around slip st to first slip st and into chain-7 space 30 stitches and 30 chain-7 spaces round 28 chain 1 * single_crochet in chain-7 space 4 double_crochet 3 treble_crochet 4 double_crochet in next chain-7 space repeat from * around slip st to first single_crochet 15 single_crochet and 15 groups fasten_off finishing using yarn needle weave in ends ties for back of flower make 4 chain 85 fasten_off using crochet hook securely attach each of the 4 strands to one side of back of flower tie flower to any 14 pillow || yarns || free projects || where to buy || links || learning || contact us || caron connections || news || latch hook || visit bond america online ©2007 caron international http //www caron com/projects/slip_stitch/ss_cno997_flower_pillow html page 3 of 3
